CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {7} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Stock Market relative to the peak of Bonds in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Stock Market is to the {right} of the peak of Bonds.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Commodities show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Commodities shows a {Periodic fluctuation}.

VPR.Q: At what value do  Bonds reach its peaks?

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Bonds} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =5.0?
EVJ.A: At X =5.0,the label with the highest density is {Bonds}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 14? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Angel Investments}'s peak at {22},{Venture Capital}'s peak at {23},{Commodities}'s peak at {23},{Stock Market}'s peak at {15},{Real Estate}'s peak at {22},{Peer-to-Peer Lending}'s peak at {24}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 18? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Venture Capital or Commodities?
NC.A: {Venture Capital} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Commodities or Peer-to-Peer Lending?
NC.A: {Peer-to-Peer Lending} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Peer-to-Peer Lending or Angel Investments?
NC.A: {Peer-to-Peer Lending} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Real Estate or Bonds?
NC.A: {Real Estate} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {6} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Bonds}
